content: turn 3 single_crochet row 6 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last st 5 single_crochet break yarn and pull tail through last st fastening off * whipstitch fin to the body at row 1 sew one pectoral fin to each side the body where the head meets the patterned section weave in all remaining ends
